meanings.sent1: She made several blunders in her math test.
meanings.sent2: The blunders in the report were embarrassing.
meanings.sent3: His blunders in cooking turned the kitchen into a mess.
meanings.sent4: The blunders he made on stage were like a comedy show.
meanings.sent5: The blunders in her speech were unforgettable.

meanings.definition: To make a stupid or careless mistake.
meanings.sent1: He often blunders when trying to fix things around the house.
meanings.sent2: She blunders every time she tries to parallel park.
meanings.sent3: The chef blunders by adding sugar instead of salt.
meanings.sent4: She blunders through life like a bull in a china shop.
meanings.sent5: He blunders his way through the dance routine.

meanings.sent1: The blunders in his painting were evident.
meanings.sent2: Her blunders in the game cost her team the victory.
meanings.sent3: The cat's blunders with the yarn made a funny scene.
meanings.sent4: His blunders in negotiations were like stumbling in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The blunders in her knitting were hard to fix.

meanings.sent1: The toddler blunders around the room, bumping into furniture.
meanings.sent2: She blunders through the obstacle course, knocking over cones.
meanings.sent3: The robot blunders through the maze, unable to find the exit.
meanings.sent4: The drunkard blunders down the street, barely able to walk straight.
meanings.sent5: The bear blunders through the forest, snapping branches underfoot.
